Text:
Wonderful.

Off topic, do you know what Bendis's role on the Dereck Storm/ Castle GN that`s coming out was?

He's credited as co-writer, but the preview pages I've seen don't really seem like Bendis...

Didn't seem to me that way either,but I don't think we can draw any conclusions after seeing 4 preview pages...although,I've heard that he actually didn't write that much of the book,just helped the other writer and it's always good to see his name on the cover ( sales-wise )...
thanks for this! it's a little bit patronising at times, but a good read nevertheless
